item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 31st January
item.description:
It's parking here more than a year and never been moved since then. I have never seen the owner. I think it's abandoned.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Warwick Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping and litter, 31st January
item.description:
Once again, there is Flytipping and litter spread up and down Faversham Road, Burrell Row, the green spaces around the entrance to Croydon Rec and the access road to Sainsbury’s. The previous call raised was marked as fixed but nothing was done. The whole area requires a deep clean - again - and ongoing monitoring and cleaning. I and others should not have to raise these issues 2 or 3 times a week.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Faversham Road, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: South Eden Park Rd - Litter, 31st January
item.description:
Full length of South Eden Park Road needs manual litter-pick to remove unsightly build up of litter on pavements, gutters, roadside grass areas, hedge-lines, around bus stops etc. Please ensure this request is only marked as closed once the work has been completed. Issues are regularly closed before action has been taken, which leads to unnecessary re-reporting. Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): South Eden Park Road, Eden Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
